org.jetel.hadoop.service.mapreduce

Class HadoopCounterKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.hadoop.service.mapreduce.HadoopCounterKey

  • public class HadoopCounterKey
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents Hadoop map/reduce job counter. Internal Hadoop API key of the every counter is an Enum constant. Instances of this interface provide unambiguous identification of that constant by providing fully qualified name of enum class declaring the constant (see getGroupName()) and declared name of the constant itself (getName()).

    This class represents only a counter key containing all information needed to obtain the value of the counter, not the actual value.

    Equality relation is defined on instances of this class by overriding methods Object.hashCode() and Object.equals(Object). Two instances are equal if and only if they have equal counter name a and group name.

    Since:
    rel-3-4-0-M2
    See Also:
    HadoopCounterGroup, HadoopJobReporter.getCounterValue(HadoopCounterKey)

    • Constructor Detail

      • HadoopCounterKey

        public HadoopCounterKey(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String groupName)
        Creates new HadoopCounterKey having given name and group name.
        Parameters:
        name - A non-null nor empty name of the counter. By contract, it must be string equal to declared name of Hadoop API specific Enum constant that is used as key for the counter by Hadoop API.
        groupName - A non-null nor empty name of the counters group that counter represented by new instance belongs to. By contract it is name of the Enum class that declares coresponding Hadoop API specific key for the counter.

      • HadoopCounterKey

        public HadoopCounterKey(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String groupName,
                java.lang.String displayName)
        Creates new HadoopCounterKey for given name, group name and user front-end name.
        Parameters:
        name - A non-null nor empty name of the counter. By contract, it must be string equal to declared name of Hadoop API specific Enum constant that is used as key for the counter by Hadoop API.
        groupName - A non-null nor empty name of the counters group that counter represented by new instance belongs to. By contract it is fully qualified name of the Enum class that declares corresponding Hadoop API specific key for the counter.
        displayName - User front end name meant to be displayed to users.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets name of the counter. By contract, it must be string equal to declared name of Hadoop API specific Enum constant that is used as key for the counter by Hadoop API.
        Returns:
        Name of the counter. It is granted to be non-null nor empty string.

      • getGroupName

        public java.lang.String getGroupName()
        Gets name of the group this counter belongs to. By contract it is fully qualified name of the Enum class that declares corresponding Hadoop API specific key of the counter. This group name is not intended to be display to user.
        Returns:
        Name of the counters group that this counter belongs to. It is granted to be non-null nor empty string.

      • getDisplayName

        public java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        Gets display name of the counter which is a name intended to be displayed to user.
        Returns:
        Value of display name if it was provided in constructor, value returned by getName() otherwise.

      • setDisplayName

        public void setDisplayName(java.lang.String displayName)
        Sets counter name to be displayed.
        Parameters:
        displayName - New value of counter name intended to be displayed to user.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Textual representation of this HadoopCounterKey instance.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Group name of the counter followed by dot and name of the counter.
